trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.IntegrationExceptionEventArgs> class enables the user to preview a layout-related exception before it is raised.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.IntegrationExceptionEventArgs>classe permite ao utilizador uma exceção relacionados com o esquema de pré-visualização, antes de ser gerado.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.IntegrationExceptionEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: In your event handler, set the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.IntegrationExceptionEventArgs.ThrowException%2A> property to `true` to indicate that the exception should be raised.
trans-unit.target: O processador de eventos, defina o valor da <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.IntegrationExceptionEventArgs.ThrowException%2A>propriedade `true` para indicar que a exceção deve ser gerada.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.IntegrationExceptionEventArgs.ThrowException%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Integration.LayoutExceptionEventArgs"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Integration.LayoutExceptionEventArgs"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: In your event handler, set the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.IntegrationExceptionEventArgs.ThrowException%2A> property to `true` to indicate that the exception should be raised.
trans-unit.target: O processador de eventos, defina o valor da <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.IntegrationExceptionEventArgs.ThrowException%2A>propriedade `true` para indicar que a exceção deve ser gerada.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.IntegrationExceptionEventArgs.ThrowException%2A>
